name: Girl Next Door
content: I've never been that too far
You always had that special thing
你总是有自己的独特之处
你一直是我心中的主角
But I never made it to your crew
然而我从来没有告诉你
You were the coolest in the school
To prove my love is true
证明我对你的爱是真心的
And I could also be cool
而且我也可以变得很酷
Did my best so you'd notice me
尽我所能 让你注意到我
But I never made it to your crew
You were the coolest in the school
To prove my love is true
证明我对你的爱是真心的
And I could also be cool
心情如无常的四季 悲喜交加
然而你不曾来到我身边
To take you out take you out
带你出去 和你约会
To prove my love is true
向你证明我对你真心的爱
And I could also be cool
To prove my love is true
证明我对你的爱是真心的
And I could also be cool
Hey miss girl next door girl next door
Will you go with me girl
你愿意做我的女朋友吗 女孩
